name: klaytn-dev-sandbox
description: A developer sandbox with sample DApp and smart contracts for the developer community of Klaytn blockchain

scripts.hh: pnpm run --filter "./contracts/" compile && pnpm run --filter "./contracts/" deploy && pnpm run --filter "./frontend/" build && pnpm run --filter "./frontend/" start
scripts.local: pnpm run --filter "./contracts/" compile && pnpm run --filter "./contracts/" deploy && pnpm run --filter "./frontend/" build && pnpm run --filter "./frontend/" start

author: klaytn
